subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Led by quarterback Jordan Lynch, the undefeated Huskies, ranked 15th in the B.C.S. standings, have their sights set on another bowl game after defeating Ball State on national television.
snippet: Led by quarterback Jordan Lynch, the undefeated Huskies, ranked 15th in the B.C.S. standings, have their sights set on another bowl game after defeating Ball State on national television.
